#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#define SIZE1 100
#define SIZE2 500

using namespace std;

int main()
{
int inp[SIZE1],n,arr[SIZE2],temp=0,m;
int i=1,j,k;
//freopen("fct.txt","w",stdout);
//cout<<"Enter number of inputs first & actual numbers (<100)on following lines:\n";
cin>>n;
for(i=0;i<n;i++)
cin>>inp[i];

for(i=0;i<n;i++)
{
arr[0]=1;
m=1;
temp=0;

for(j = 1;j <= inp[i];j++)
{
k=0;
while(k<m)
{
          
temp = arr[k]*j + temp;
arr[k] = temp % 10;
temp = temp/10;
k++;

}

while(temp>0)
{
             arr[k] = temp % 10;
             temp = temp/10;
             k++;
             m++;
}
}
for(j=m-1;j>=0;j--)
{
                cout<<arr[j];
}
cout<<endl;
}

return 0;
}
